hero.subtitle: Technology with human judgment
hero.description: This site brings together ideas, processes, and work focused on creating products with meaning.

built.title: Things I've built
built.p1: I'm the creator of <zanto>Zanto</zanto>, a clothing brand founded in 2013 together with my brother <gustavo>Gustavo</gustavo>, built around a precise balance between formal and informal. I've been involved in the creation and development of <ness>Ness Digital</ness>, a SaaS focused on centralized management and process optimization in the healthcare sector, prioritizing patient care and safety.
built.p2: I currently work as Operations Manager at <biotissue>BioTissue Colombia</biotissue>, where I focus on continuous improvement across processes, logistics, and operations.
built.p3: I've built digital projects using <astro>Astro</astro>, including the website for <jhonny>Jhonny Aponza</jhonny>, a motivational speaker.
built.p4: Using <framer>Framer</framer>, I developed the website for <derwins>DER'S ROOFING</derwins>, with a strong focus on clarity, performance, and simplicity.

thinking.p2: I move between design, development, and problem-solving, with a clear orientation toward human service. thinking.p3: I'm interested in creating products that are honest, simple, useful, and elegant. I work with transparency, discipline, and enthusiasm, making sure each project delivers real value to people.
thinking.p4: I believe that meaningful contributions often start by solving small problems well.
